  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action 
    Class and Description
    ActionParameterExtractor
    In addition to custom value serializers, action controller uses parameter extractors for resolving action parameters that can’t be resolved using serialization engine.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action.client 
    Class and Description
    ClientActionSender
    By default, client actions must return one of the following object types: SendCondition implementation UserContext implementation List of UserContext implementations To extend this behaviour, you need to create a class implementing this interface.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action.client.strategy 
    Class and Description
    ClientActionSender
    By default, client actions must return one of the following object types: SendCondition implementation UserContext implementation List of UserContext implementations To extend this behaviour, you need to create a class implementing this interface.
    SendCondition
    Basic filter interface, used to determine message recipients.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action.exception.handler 
    Class and Description
    ActionExceptionHandler
    This interface should be implemented when special reaction for more or less specified exception is required.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action.extractor 
    Class and Description
    ActionParameterExtractor
    In addition to custom value serializers, action controller uses parameter extractors for resolving action parameters that can’t be resolved using serialization engine.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action.interceptor 
    Class and Description
    ActionInterceptor
    Every action can be intercepted by any number of action interceptors.
    ActionInterceptorContextResolver
    This helper interface serves as a interceptor context object provider for each interception operation type.
    ActionInterceptorMatcher
    Using implementations of this interface, user can easily organize action interceptors and assign them to actions without Intercept annotations.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action.interceptor.matcher
